data.text:
Memory and began to wonder if she was going insane, or if she was Anna Devane, a Alex and Edmund got off to a rocky start, but slowly theyįell in love and planned to be married. His dressing down was found at the shore, and his loved ones could onlyĪssume he was dead. Edmund refused to accept his brother writing off survival so quicklyĪnd persuaded Alex and Dimitri to try stem cell therapy to save his life.Īmazingly, the treatments began to work, but one day Dimitri wandered near the

Her to not let his friends and family see him so weak and to stage his death Alex admitted that Dimitri was still alive, dying from a debilitating illness. Alex continued to act strangely to her husband's death, refusing to share the medical report findings and then ordering a closed casket funeral.Įdmund managed to get the casket open, and found nothing inside. There was also talk of Alexandra agreeing to do something quite odd for Dimitri, but what this was not revealed. They had made plans to start a family together and re-settle in Pine Valley. When alone, Alex would reflect on happier times with Dimitri. Many doubted Alex's sincerity and feelings for Dimitri, but Peggy and Brooke both could see the affection in her eyes. Erica did not take well to the news that Dimitri had found another lover. It was then that Alex dropped the bombshell that she was the new Mrs. Edmund said that he was Dimitri's brother and would decide what was to be done.

Alex stepped forward and announced that an autopsy would not be performed. She elected to remain hidden at the airport while Dimitri and his loved ones traveled to Seaview Hospital to see if there was anything that the doctors could do to resurrect Dimitri.Īlex finally made her presence known when Edmund asked that an autopsy be done on his brother to determine the cause of his death. Before they could tell the good news, Dimitri fell ill and subsequently died. She and new husband, Dimitri Marick, were headed back to town from London to break the news of their marriage. When Alexandra laid her first steps on Pine Valley soil it was under the saddest of circumstances.
